channel.title: Help with Delta base and Npc Drops
channel.description: I have looked at many many tuts, but none correspond to deltascape source. Yes, ive used the search bar, but i still can't find this. All i need is for someone to explain to me how to edit and add npc drops in delta source. Thanks, and help is much appreciated.

item.title: Help with Delta base and Npc Drops
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

NPCDrops configuration file.

npcdrop = 2263	5509	1	10

2263 is the NPC’s ID.
5509 is an item ID.
1 is the amount of 5509 it will drop.
10 is the percentage of 1 drop of 5509.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Delta base and Npc Drops

item.title: Help with Delta base and Npc Drops
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Okay this is easy stuff open your source and go to config and than click on npcdrops.cfg search for the npc u want to add the drop to and add the item id the ammount and the percent rate that it drops 1 for ultra rare 100 for always and anyhting in between

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Delta base and Npc Drops
